body_html: Unfortunately, gels in MAGMA doesn't have many variants unlike LAPACK, which makes me wonder if gels in MAGMA is capable of operating on rank-deficient matrices at all. I was also unable to find any note in MAGMA that suggests the usage of gels for rank deficient matrices.
body_text: Unfortunately, gels in MAGMA doesn't have many variants unlike LAPACK, which makes me wonder if gels in MAGMA is capable of operating on rank-deficient matrices at all. I was also unable to find any note in MAGMA that suggests the usage of gels for rank deficient matrices.
body: Unfortunately, `gels` in MAGMA doesn't have many variants unlike LAPACK, which makes me wonder if `gels` in MAGMA is capable of operating on rank-deficient matrices at all. I was also unable to find any note in MAGMA that suggests the usage of `gels` for rank deficient matrices.
